channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Server Status Filtering
channel.description: Hey guys, this is a suggestion aimed at the Server Status page. In an attempt to decrease the amount of moderation effort needed to keep it clean, I propose a censor that, if a certain word is detected, either automatically removes the advertisement, or notifies a global moderator via email to check out the advertisement. For example, if the advertisement contains "bot", "OSRS", etc. it will be flagged and quick-notify a moderator. Thoughts?
